amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt from the bill's congressional approval requirement any rule pertaining to nuclear reactor safety standards in order to prevent nuclear meltdowns.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in part B of House Report 114-230 to exempt from the bill's congressional approval requirement any rule pertaining to nuclear reactor safety standards in order to prevent nuclear meltdowns like the one in Fukushima.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 241 (Roll no. 479).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Nadler amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 167 - 241 (Roll no. 479).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Nadler.
